title: Acetylcholine regulates the melanogenesis of retinal pigment epithelia cells via a cAMP-dependent pathway: A non-neuronal function of cholinergic system in retina
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Ivan Kong, Gary Ka-Wing Yuen, Qi-Yun Wu, Maggie Sui-Sui Guo, Jin Gao, Tina Ting-Xia Dong, Karl Wah-Keung Tsim
